```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("dplyr")
library("ggplot2")
library("tidyverse")
library("rstatix")

root <- rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file()

```

```{r reading in data}
dir3 <- "//data//raw//"
path_in = paste0(root,dir3)

# Chemtax files
file.chem <-
  fs::dir_ls(path = paste0(root,dir3),
             recurse = TRUE,
             regexp = "\\.xls$")
```


```{r}
cmtx1 <-
    readxl::read_xls(
        file.chem[1],
        sheet = 2,
        range = "D177:N178",
        .name_repair = janitor::make_clean_names
    ) %>%
    mutate(cluster_code = 1, season = "W")

cmtx2 <-
    readxl::read_xls(
        file.chem[2],
        sheet = 2,
        range = "D273:N274",
        .name_repair = janitor::make_clean_names
    ) %>%
    mutate(cluster_code = 2, season = "Sp")

cmtx3 <-
    readxl::read_xls(
        file.chem[3],
        sheet = 2,
        range = "D241:N242",
        .name_repair = janitor::make_clean_names
    ) %>%
    mutate(cluster_code = 3, season = "Su")

cmtx4 <-
    readxl::read_xls(
        file.chem[4],
        sheet = 2,
        range = "D305:N306",
        .name_repair = janitor::make_clean_names
    ) %>%
    mutate(cluster_code = 4, season = "F")

cmtx_all <- full_join(cmtx1, cmtx2) %>%
    full_join(cmtx3) %>%
    full_join(cmtx4) %>%
    mutate(season = forcats::fct_relevel(season, "W", "Sp", "Su", "F"))
```

```{r plotting}
chloro_seasons <- ggplot(cmtx_all, aes(x=season, y=chloro)) +
    geom_point(size=2) +
    geom_line(group=1, size=1) +
    theme_bw() +
    labs(title = "Chlorophytes") +
    xlab("Season") +
    ylab("Concentration (mg/m^3)")
```

```{r}
cmtx_avgs <- readxl::read_xls(
    file.chem[5],
    sheet=1,
    .name_repair = janitor::make_clean_names
)

meta_data <- dplyr::select(.data=pig_dat, 
                            hplc_gsfc_id:filter_storage_before_shipment_to_gfsc, 
                            comments, season) %>%
    filter(name_of_water_body == "Florida Keys")
cmtx_avgs <- full_join(meta_data, cmtx_avgs, by=c("sample" = "sample_id")) %>%
    mutate(season= forcats::fct_relevel(season, "W", "Sp", "Su", "F"))
```

```{r boxplots}
ggplot(cmtx_avgs, aes(x=season, y=chloro))+
    geom_boxplot() +
    theme_bw() +
    ylim(0,0.125) +
    theme_bw() +
    geom_jitter(width = 0.4, size=1, aes(color = year)) +
    scale_colour_gradient2(
        low = "red",
        mid = "blue",
        high = "green",
        midpoint = 2018.5) +
    labs(title = "Chlorophytes") +
    xlab("Season") +
```

```{r ANOVA}
#ANOVA test
summary(aov(diat2 ~ season, data=cmtx_avgs))

#Dunn test with Bonferroni correction
chloro_dunn <- dunn_test(cmtx_avgs, chloro ~ season, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
crypto_dunn <- dunn_test(cmtx_avgs, crypto ~ season, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
cyano4_dunn <- dunn_test(cmtx_avgs, cyano4 ~ season, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
dino_dunn <- dunn_test(cmtx_avgs, dino ~ season, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
hapt6_dunn <- dunn_test(cmtx_avgs, hapt6 ~ season, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
hapt8_dunn <- dunn_test(cmtx_avgs, hapt8 ~ season, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
pras_dunn <- dunn_test(cmtx_avgs, pras ~ season, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

```
